Yip yip. You havnt actually selected the game when you made this script. Also the coconut moves around so this wont always hit it.

Not to criticise but youve released a tonne of scriptsinto the neopets forum. Of which the ones i have looked at i dont think any of them would work im sorry to say.

item.title: Cocount Shy Script!
item.dc:creator: @sslleeaakkiinngg sslleeaakkiinngg
item.description:
@sslleeaakkiinngg wrote:

Here is the script,please read the “NOTES” on the script they are very important.Here it is,its simple to make:
[scar]////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// By:SSlleeaakkiinngg. //
// Type:Coconut Shy //
// This is my fifth script. //
// Please comment on this. //
// Hope you enjoy it! //
// Works on any. //
// //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////
program coconut;
begin
clickmouse(245,578,true);//NOTE:Will not get jackpot,will just hit the coconut every time
clickmouse(526,578,true);//NOTE:You will have to run the script every time you play,because I dont want to lose people’s neopoints
clickmouse(437,591,true);
end.
[/scar]

Read full topic
